meanings.definition: The ventral plate of a segment of an arthropod body.
meanings.sent1: The sternites of the beetle help protect its belly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the sternites of insects to understand their anatomy better.
meanings.sent3: The ant joked that its sternites were like tiny shields for its tummy.
meanings.sent4: The sternites of the spider gleamed like polished armor in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the sternites of the cockroach fascinated the biologist.

meanings.definition: The ventral part of a segment of an arthropod body.
meanings.sent1: Careful observation revealed the sternites of the grasshopper.
meanings.sent2: The entomologist pointed out the sternites on the underside of the beetle.
meanings.sent3: The cricket bragged about the shiny sternites on its underside.
meanings.sent4: The sternites of the centipede looked like a row of tiny shields.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design on the sternites of the millipede amazed the young student.
